FuncDef:
The ike local-name command configures the local name of the device used in IKE negotiation.
The undo ike local-name command restores the default setting.
By default, the local name is not set.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the name of the local device.
It is a string of 1 to 255 case sensitive characters.

ExtraInfo: The ike local-name command is required if local-id-type in the ike peer configuration is set to fqdn.
